recipe.title: Microwave 4-minute BBQ Chicken Nachos Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; pico de gallo ; (60 g)
¼ cup ; green onion, thinly sliced ; (35 g)

steps.step: Mix the chicken with the barbecue sauce, then spread evenly over a bed of tortilla chips.
Spread the pico de gallo, cheese, and green onions evenly on top, then microwave for about 1-2 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Dollop with some guacamole and sour cream, then serve.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Mix the chicken with the barbecue sauce, then spread evenly over a bed of tortilla chips.
Spread the pico de gallo, cheese, and green onions evenly on top, then microwave for about 1-2 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Dollop with some guacamole and sour cream, then serve.
